Resorts

Utah's ski resorts offer a variety of sizes, costs, and styles, fit for every skier and snowboarder. The Wasatch Mountains provide many types of terrain. Utah's resorts are home to steep peaks, great powder, fresh groomers, and awesome terrain parks. These resorts offer good times for experienced riders, as well as families looking to enjoy the slopes together. Below are a few of the different mountain resorts Utah has to offer!
